title: Introduction to Python
subtitle: Beginner level
description: This lesson provides an introduction to the Python programming language, covering basic syntax, data types, and control structures.
info: Learn the fundamentals of Python programming
Understand variables, data types, and control structures in Python
Get hands-on practice through practical coding exercises
Suitable for beginners with no programming experience
Great stepping stone for more advanced Python courses

title: Object-Oriented Programming in Java
subtitle: Intermediate level
description: In this lesson, we will cover the principles of object-oriented design and programming in Java, including classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism.
info: Learn object-oriented programming concepts in Java
Understand classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism
Get hands-on practice with coding exercises and quizzes
Suitable for intermediate-level Java developers
Great foundation for advanced Java programming courses

title: React Fundamentals
subtitle: Intermediate level
description: This lesson will introduce you to the React library for building user interfaces with JavaScript. We will cover the basics of components, state, and props.
info: Learn the fundamentals of building user interfaces with React
Understand components, state, and props in React
Get hands-on practice with practical coding exercises
Suitable for intermediate-level JavaScript developers
Great stepping stone for more advanced React courses

title: Machine Learning with TensorFlow
subtitle: Advanced level
description: In this lesson, we will explore the TensorFlow library for developing machine learning applications. We will cover topics such as neural networks, convolutional networks, and recurrent networks.
info: Learn how to develop machine learning applications with TensorFlow
Understand neural networks, convolutional networks, and recurrent networks
Get hands-on practice with coding exercises and real-world examples
Suitable for advanced-level developers with some knowledge of machine learning
Great foundation for more advanced TensorFlow courses

title: Data Processing with Pandas
subtitle: Beginner level
description: In this lesson, we will cover the Pandas library for data manipulation and analysis in Python. We will cover topics such as data frames, series, and joining and merging data.
info: Learn how to manipulate and analyze data with Pandas library in Python
Understand data frames, series, and joining and merging data
Get hands-on practice with coding exercises and real-world examples
Suitable for beginners with no prior knowledge of data analysis or Pandas
Great stepping stone for more advanced data analysis courses
